person.persName: Matthew A. Gay (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Naomi H. Gay. Father of William G. Gay, Sarah E. Gay, Hannah Gay, Alice Gay, Matthew Gay Jr., and James P. Gay. Farmer in Franklin County in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860. Employed Charles Russell as a laborer in 1860.
